text: David F. Gantt (September 12, 1941 â€“ July 1, 2020) was an American politician. He was a Democratic member of the New York State Assembly from 1983 until his death in 2020. From 2012 to 2020, he represented the 137th Assembly District. He was born in Opp, Alabama. Gantt died on July 1, 2020 in Rochester, New York at age 78. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Alabama Category:Politicians from Rochester, New York Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: David F. Gantt
